price: 41. pakeisti juos geresniais už juos. Ir neįmanoma Mūsų pralenkti.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
